Package com.pddstudio.networkutils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectionService  
    DiscoveryService
    A Service for looking up several discovery types (Avahi/Bonjour/Zeroconf) on a network.
    NetworkUtils
    NetworkUtils Library class to interact with the library.
    PingService
    A Service for executing Ping requests on a given target address.
    PortService
    A Service to scan for open ports (TCP) on a given target.
